title: Rust crash, Rust trash
selftext: I bought the game today and was hyped to try it out. First time i tried to join a server the game crashed. Second time, same thing. Third time, same thing... I’ve tried 10 times and it crashes at the same place every time. I have the latest system software update and have restarted my PS4 Pro twice to see if that would work. Any tips on what else i could try?
